titleStmt.title: Justification by faith: or, a confutation of that antinomian error, that justification is before faith; being the sum & substance of a sermon / preached at Sarum; by Benjamin Woodbridge, minister of Newberry in Barkshire. May 26. 1652. Imprimatur, Edmund Calamy.
titleStmt.author: Woodbridge, Benjamin, 1622-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field for Edmund Paxton, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls-Chain, over against the Castle-Tavern, near to the Doctors Commons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls-Chain, over against the Castle-Tavern, near to the Doctors Commons
